articles.title: Chelsea forward Timo Werner not 'satisfied' following difficult start to the season - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 25-year-old has started just three of the Blues' seven Premier League games so far this season, and only got off the mark for the season at the weekend in the 3-1 win against Southampton.
articles.content:
Timo Werner has admitted he is not 'satisfied' with the amount of game time he has seen at Chelsea this season, but insists he is not looking to leave.
